reviews.text: Polite workers and great food
Yellow rice with oxtail a lunch 20.00? R u seriouss ???never again....PEOPLE CHECKOUT EXQUISITO 36 AVE IN ASTORIA QUEENS SAME LUNCH FOR 14.00 I JUST GOT ROBBED
Very good

Food really tasty. I had the tripe soup. It was good but could have been a little hotter. Overall, food could have been hotter. The prices were reasonable, as well as the portions. Server was very amicable and pleasant. Made food come out quick. I would go again.
They deserve a zero ignoring customers and on a Friday night closing a whole hour early not caring for the public at all

Feels amazing, good food - great vibes - and the staff is friendly unlike other places . But it‚Äôs all good they are my go to thank god for kindness it always wins I appreciate them. The manager is a wealth of knowledge awesome conversations every time. I thank you for setting the standard.

This might be the best breakfast I‚Äôve ever had‚Äîanywhere. The Dominican breakfast was so good, I kept eating long past full. The fresh passion fruit juice was perfection, and that mang√∫? Pure heaven‚Äîcreamy, with those homemade pickled red onions on top. The coffee is smooth and dark, and the owner and server are kind and make you feel at home. I‚Äôm coming back for another plate before I leave Brooklyn!
Food used to be better
Doesnt open when it says its gonna open. Waited outside. They let other people including a traffic agent go in and get something then locked the door back.

One of my FAVORITE local Dominican üá©üá¥ restaurants in Flatbush. Delicious, nutritious food at reasonable prices. For instance, you can get a large soup, that will take you two meals or two separate eating times for ten bucks. Service is quick and friendly, especially if you speak some Spanish. And, they always have the tunes. Van wait to return!
Deliciosa comida
Excelente atencion comida muy rica
I love the Dominican breakfast. Very good, friendly service. The dining area is spacious and captivating, as it is caparisoned with an abundance of medieval armor and chivalrous figurines.
Family friendly - their family combo meals are great and extremely cost effective. Food is always hot and fresh. I would recommend them many times over!
Just spent $ on lunch special. Food way too bland, got to.bring it home and fix it.

I paid about $18 for yuca and 1/2 lb of chicharron‚Ä¶ both of these containers are the smallest size they have. The pork was so hard that the women struggled cutting it with the scissors. I‚Äôm at home eating it now and I can barely get my teeth through it. The Dominican restaurant Melanie down the block has the same thing for about $5 less. Very disappointed. I‚Äôve been to this place about 3 times and I can say each time I haven‚Äôt been satisfied. They have plenty of food options so I guess that‚Äôs a plus..
Good foiled but lil expensive

Ped√≠ 3pollos rostizados el dia de ayer 19 de mayo 5 de la tarde ped√≠,  y me mandaron pollo al horno  la comida honestamente  se veia sobre cocida,y mal aspecto y cosa que nunca me dijeron que no hab√≠a pollo  rostizados, yo siempre compraba pollo  aqu√≠ nunca m√°s volver√©  a comprar se justificaron que hab√≠an pasado dos horas contando el tiempo de la llamada y la mujer  dijo que el due√±o no estaba,.y que la tienda perd√≠a, y yo tambi√©n  perd√≠ 45 d√≥lares no me dieron soluci√≥n  alguna.y el pollo ni lo comimos x que realmente no ten√≠a sabor y estaban todos mal las pieza  no eran exactas para ser 3 pollos
Amazing

It‚Äôs solid, the food doesn‚Äôt disappoint. I wish the ladies serving the food would use gloves instead of putting their fingers and thumbs inside the container they‚Äôre  serving the food in, but whatever. I like it and I think it‚Äôs a dude that runs the place. He‚Äôs super nice.
La carne! Sabrosa
Good place, has buster sword

I‚Äôm not the biggest unsolicited review leaver, but sometimes you just have to. I catered my housewarming with food from here, and not only was the price for the amount of food you get amazing, but the food itself was even better. Giovanni and Monica are such sweet people and great restaurant owners. 10/10 will be back
Great place, open 24hrs
Best Spanish food in Brooklyn!! I love to eat here üòä
La chica que contesta el tel√©fono para los deliveries tiene la peor actitud, la comida es buena pero su servicio deja mucho que desear‚Ä¶
Buen Provecho! The food is delicious and the cost inexpensive. Will definitely be back!
Small space to eat

ORDENE UN PEDIDO GRANDE LA SEMANA PASADA FEBRERO 2/25  PICADERA , JUGOS , POSTRE TODO ESTUVO BIEN  LLEGO A TIEMPO LE DOY 5 ESTRELLA PORQU√â ME GUSTO C√ìMO ENVIARON LOS JUGOS LA COMIDA LLEGO FRESCO  BIEN PROTEJIDOS  LOS JUGOS  LLEGARON BIEN SIN VACIARSE EL JOVEN QU√â TOMO MI PEDIDO MUY AMABLE LOS JUGOS SI SON JUGOS üëçüëç
Full menu available early

There's more and more fancier type of restaurants in this neighborhood where they give you a little something for an astronomical price.  Then there is this spot, which gives you lots of Dominican food without pretensions and it's cheap.  If you are looking for some good tasty food and want to sit down and have a meal, you can't go wrong here.
Good atmosphere and fun holiday decor, food was very good and fairly priced, plus the smoothies were cheap, delicious, and big. I will be back üëç
Muy buen servicio su personal muy amable y todo
There food is excellent there cook everything to perfection and there are sweet and respect
Great attention
Vengo desde Colombia y me encant√≥ la comida y el lugar üôèüèª
Muy malo la comida vieja y cruda y tarda mucho para preparar la orden
The pork shoulder was horrible. It taste really old. I won‚Äôt even serve this food to my dogs.
Servicio p√©simo, la comida es como calentada del d√≠a anterior y los miembros del staff son mal educados.
Los deliveri los dejan de √∫ltimo la comida llega fr√≠a y tardan demasiado para despachar la orden
Don‚Äôt eat here. Not even if you‚Äôre starving. It‚Äôs not okay for them to serve this garbage to people.
Absolutely disgusting food. No way this is real

The food tastes rotten, literally rotten. And I got a second and third opinion and we all agree that the food is rotten! Shame on you! We were going to feed our kids this food and they refused to acknowledge!!

The customer service was not friendly I been supporting this business for years and recently there are getting very rude and when ask to speak to the manager they didnt give me the opportunity to do that
Awesome price awesome food
Very authentic and tasty meals leave you happy full
Tasty, attractive presentation great appetizing atmosphere üëå
Great food, wonderful customer service and good prices! Me and my Mom's go to spot.

The friendliest, most accommodating service!
They went out of their way to please the cranky, tired and sleepy toddler! As a result, toddler was happy!
Mofongo con camarones is da üí£!
Definitely worth the trip, even from the city.
Tripe soup was pretty decent as well.
All in all, Castillo is definitely worth visiting.

They have got Dominican dishes, rotisserie chickrn, beef stew, rice n beans etc. The food is ok. The service is so so, nobody is going to understand you, dont expect a lot,  just point at something and hopefully you'll get it.‚Ä¶

I ordered chicken , rice and beans. Chicken came cold and salty.even I told the waiter chicken is cold. She dam doesn‚Äôt care what I said.and When I ask for napkins , waiters doesn‚Äôt care about napkins too.service was so bad.I have to ask them twice for napkins.this is really not good experience.I don‚Äôt know how they run the business here.If there is 0 star ‚≠êÔ∏è. I will give them 0.

As a Latino whenever Im in NYC and I‚Äôm craving for my rice & beans, plantains, mofongo and stewed chicken I come to this place.
This is like home away from home type of food.
I always come during the lunch time.
Great service.

Great food and affordable prices. I ordered a small sancocho soup and a cod fish lunch special that comes with rice and beans. Our waitress was nice and attentive. Everything tasted good, my only complain was that the cod fish was cold.‚Ä¶

Great employees, they are super nice and helpful with preparing dishes. Sometimes they can take a little longer depending on what you want, but they do their best to keep it speedy. Paying with cash saves you a little but they accept‚Ä¶

Absolutely disgusting i basically order rice for 10 with i asked was pernil not fat but what did i go with a gross piece of fat a enough rice to eat for 2 days they are extremely racist towards black ppl ..white and Spanish ppl they treat with kindness black ppl come in they are cold and dismissive...im tired supporting others races that want my mind but cant respect as a human being because my hue is black...over it,  it 2023 not standing for ..they place is terrible...
Such an amazing place! Really good portions and really well spiced. The spinach dip and spaghetti were the two favorites! The falafel was also really good and packed :)

I'm usually happy with my orders but this sandwich is disappointing.  3 slices of ham only for the price they charge. Never again and we ordered 2 and all you taste is bread.  I'll get my ham n cheese from the bodega next time.
Great place for family events.  Food is delicious and very affordable! Latin Music. Great service.
Delicious Spanish food you will not be disappointed very friendly staff very clean great atmosphere will definitely be returning to this establishment. Highly reccomend. ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê

I got up early to surprise my  husband  with a Spanish style breakfast. I met the owner, who is hands-on with his restaurant. The workers are very pleasant and did a great job with what I ordered.  I took it home and fed my husband in bed. He enjoyed the bacon and ate everything.  I or we will definitely be back for lunch or dinner one day. The restaurant is very clean and the  atmosphere seems very nice for a romantic dinner.

I go to this place at least once a week. The women behind the counter are so nice. The food is delicious, the portions are generous, and the prices are so reasonable! I usually get the stewed or jerk chicken, rice and peas, and plantains. They also fish / beans for people who don't eat meat. They have some staples and also have a rotating selection of other dishes. Sometimes I'll get their whole rotisserie chicken that lasts me a few meals. This place never misses!

Antes me gustaba mucho la comida de ah√≠ pero no se que paso. Ahora ya boy tres veces mi comida siempre est√° mal. Como lo ven ah√≠ los vegetales vienen podridos y ya huele mal y ya boy tres veses que  tiro mi comida a la basura yo creo que‚Ä¶

May 2024
Went and gave them anorher try
Less portions and more expensive
I ordered beef stew like i always did and now the server is giving only 3 little pieces of meat.  I said its 4 she said 3 etc....now i know why i stopped coming here and wont even try this place again.The food is good but depending on who your server is will determine your experience. Some servers will give you healthy portions while other will give you the minimum. One server told me I was rude because I asked for more portions in my order.
I don't order or pickup anymore because of this lady.
Fast forward til after the New Year and I tried to order again.They took my order then said "oh if you called 1 second earlier we could have delivered but as of 1 second ago we stopped doing deliveries" as he was laughing

Pleasantly surprised at how quickly we were seated and served. The server was efficient and extra nice. If you like Spanish food it was fairly good. Rice and beans were excellent. I also had the fried pork chops which were cooked to perfection but the seasoning was just a little off. I would give them 4 out of five stars.

We went to try their food for possible catering, but unfortunately they don't deliver to the location. We stood there to eat and it was so delicious. I had white rice, black beans and filet of sole in garlic sauce and it was delicious. The‚Ä¶

Good, warm service. I enjoy the food, the serving is great for the price. You can easily eat twice out one tray if you don't eat a lot. Breakfast isn't their strong suit but it does hit the spot if you need something basic to warm the‚Ä¶
Delicious latino food, staff is very friendly and helpful .....great atmosphere

Their chicken soup is so hearty and reminds me of home, and their camarofongo sauce is  is very yummy but honestly dining in here kind of sucks. The waitresses just walk pass you like nothing and constantly forget stuff lol we‚Äôve been here twice already and it always feels like we‚Äôre a bother to them.

I think take out is better suited for this restaurant.

The person who takes order is really slow and was giggling most of the time I was on the phone trying to give her my  order. I also heard a mans voice in the background while shes giggling. I had to repeat my order three times and the address bc she wasnt even listening. This was on a saturday at 4pm. I get you can have fun at the job but do your job first.

Staple in the community! Fantastic Dominican style cuisine, tons of options. As a Latina, I know great Spanish food! I‚Äôve been coming here for years! The owner is always present and friendly. They provide a vibrant authentic Latin atmosphere, which makes  it feel like home. Most importantly, food is always fresh!

Thank you!
Amazing family owned business great food good value. Great place for a hearty meal and family celebrations.

The food here is MAD GOOD. I don‚Äôt know what any of the negative reviews are talking about. They always give a hearty portion and the prices are amazing. The service is always fast and polite. I love eating here. The PERNIL is my favorite dish.

I stood there for over 10 minutes no one asked me what I wanted or attempted to serve me.

Go down the street to La Cabana Rodriguez, they have Afro Latino staff, attitudes are better, and food tastes better.

Disgusting prejudiced colorism culture and tradition, Break The Cycle.
Fresh good food pricy  2 meals  40$
I ordered by phone for pick up and my food was ready when I got there. Friendly, cheerful and efficient service and delicious food at great prices. Yum!
I love El Castillo DE jagua the food is great one of my favorites restaurant in Brooklyn.. Bomb chicken, very good pricing, helpful and friendly staff. I will definitely be returning very soon..

The services was absolutely horrendous. We get in there and sit down. It takes for me to flag down the waitress for some menus. Then we place our order. While we wait, we don't receive any water or nothing. After about 20 minutes we finally receive our appetizers, which came out BEFORE our sodas. To top it off, they didn't give is any utensils and napkins. I had to ask for that too. Then when I asked some guy for a few green sauces, his attitude was disgusting. He very nastily respond, "HOW MUCH YOU WANT??" Disgusting attitude, like I was bothering him. And I only asked him because our own waitress kept on disappearing for 20 minutes at a time. Lastly, my friend ordered a papaya shake in the beginning when we ordered our drinks. She didn't receive it till about 10 minutes before we left. They kept forgetting.

Like I said, the service was absolutely disgusting, the food was maybe 3 stars, but the food quality don't matter when the service is bad. Never again for me.

beef stew was p good but stingiest possible portions. 3 pieces of beef, 2 pieces of potatoes/carrots, mostly rice for $10 lol. owner served me and acted like he did me such a favor by letting me mix my meal a little (+$2 for two pieces of pork). pork was too dry. otherwise, i sampled a lot of their other food from my siblings and we all agreed their food was mediocre esp for the pricing+portions. chicken tasted p flat

cringe conquistador aesthetics

definitely wouldn't recommend
